Address.Address1: P.O. Khimsar, Dist. Nagaur, Khimsar, Rajasthan

Description.Text: The WELCOMHOTEL KHIMSAR FORT AND DUNES is a hotel. Located in Khimsar area..

Location Welcomhotel Khimsar Fort and Dunes is nestled in the small village of Khimsar, in the Nagaur district of Rajasthan, 90 km drive from the centre of Jodhpur. The hotel is approximately 2 hour journey from Jodphur Airport and the Jodphur railway station. Nagaur railway station is 43 km away. Facilities The hotel features an array of facilities and services including gift shop, wireless internet connection, 24-hour front desk and safe deposit box. Hotel staff can organize camel/jeep safari to the Black Buck reserve and sand dunes as well as village tours to the local potter, cobbler and weaver. Guests have a wide selection of local and Indian cuisine served at the restaurant while refreshments are offered at the poolside bar. Alternatively, room service is also available. Accommodation Each guestroom features traditional architecture and furnishings and are furnished with all the modern facilities such as an individually controlled air conditioning, tea and coffee making facilities, satellite TV, direct dial telephone, mini bar and electronic safe. Iron and ironing board are available upon request. Sports/Entertainment Recreational facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, well-equipped gymnasium, tennis court, table tennis and billiards. Ayurvedic massage and a broad range of wellness treatments are offered at the spa.
